plot: A scripted reality show where two police officers keep order in a land full of storybook villains, magical monsters, and other cartoonish characters.
title: Fairy Tale Police
plot_es: A scripted reality show where two police officers keep order in a land full of storybook villains, magical monsters, and other cartoonish characters.
